description.@en: French military mages developed this magic; I, however, have claimed it as my own . . .

criticalFailure.@en: You are momentarily Deafened, and foes gain the advantage of Surprise against you until the end of combat.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they cannot Resist.

effect.@en: After successfully casting (and those caught in a Cone Template cannot or fail to Resist using Toughness), foes are Surprised by all Actions In Combat, until combat ends.

reagents.@en: Clap your hands together, or clap one hand with another person
